TopicTitle: No sound selection available in settings/audio tab

Articles.Content:
I have installed the alarm version 3.14.0.0. This is on a MacBook.  When I go to settings and try to test a sound under the drop down box no sound are listed.  I go into explorer and the .wav files are there under the Sounds subdirectory. I click on the sound and the OS plays it. I restarted herbal and all the  stock audio settings have a value and are playing.  the wav files are in the .../KerbalAlarmClock/Sounds subdirectory. The program seems to work as normal just no sound.  I will have to be alert to see the pop up  

TIA

Larry

Middle of WY ,  8 degrees,    6 in of snow

I looked into the settings.cfg file and saw this code for alarm sounds.  Should there be an soundname for them?

AlarmSounds
    {
        Item
        {
            Name = Raw
            Enabled = False
            RepeatCount = 3
            SoundName = None
            Types
            {
                Item = Raw
            }
        }
        Item
        {
            Name = Manuever
            Enabled = True
            RepeatCount = 3
            SoundName = None
            Types
            {
                Item = Maneuver
                Item = ManeuverAuto
            }
        }
        Item
        {
            Name = AP/Pe
            Enabled = False
            RepeatCount = 3
            SoundName = None
            Types
            {
                Item = Apoapsis
                Item = Periapsis
            }
